Lyric:
[00:19.000]Some folks are born made to wave the flag'
[00:22.500]ooh' they\'re red' white and blue.
[00:26.000]And when the band plays \"Hail To The Chief\"'
[00:30.000]oh' they point the cannon at you' Lord'
[00:33.500]It ain\'t me' it ain\'t me'
[00:36.900]I ain\'t no senator\'s son'
[00:41.000]It ain\'t me' it ain\'t me'
[00:44.000]I ain\'t no fortunate one' no'
[00:47.000]Some folks are born silver spoon in hand'
[00:51.000]Lord' don\'t they help themselves? oh.
[00:55.000]But when the taxman come to the door'
[00:59.000]Lord' the house look a like a rummage sale' yes'
[01:02.790]It ain\'t me' it ain\'t me'
[01:05.790]I ain\'t no millionaire\'s son' no' no.
[01:09.790]It ain\'t me' it ain\'t me'
[01:12.790]I ain\'t no fortunate one' no.
[01:29.790]Yeh... some folks inherit star spangled eyes'
[01:35.000]ooh' they send you down to war' Lord'
[01:39.000]And when you ask them' how much should we give'
[01:42.500]oh' they only answer' more' more' more' yoh'
[01:46.000]It ain\'t me' it ain\'t me'
[01:49.800]I ain\'t no military son' SON' NO
[01:53.000]It ain\'t me' it ain\'t me'
[01:57.000]I ain\'t no fortunate one' NO NO
